title: Presidential Pardon for 197 prisoners
content: 197 prisoners are due to receive the Presidential pardon on the  occasion of the 74th National Independence Day.President Gotabaya Rajapaksa had received several requests from various quarters to release MP Ranjan Ramanayaka on Independence Day (4).The President has granted a Presidential pardon to prisoners in accordance with the powers vested in him by Article 34 of the Constitution on the occasion of Independence Day.
